patthana1.11:163.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā novigate pañca.
patthana1.11:167.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā novigate pañca.
patthana1.11:171.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri, indriye jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate cattāri, avigate cattāri.

patthana1.11:179.2: ācayagāmiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. #1

patthana1.11:192.2: ahetukaṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana1.11:198.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane dve, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi.

patthana1.11:212.2: ācayagāmī hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.11:215.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana1.11:216.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:218.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:218.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.11:218.3: Sekkhā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.11:218.4: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā ācayagāmī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana1.11:218.10: domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena ācayagāmicittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanakusalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:218.13: ācayagāmī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:219.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:219.2: arahā pahīne kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānāti, ācayagāmī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati;
patthana1.11:219.4: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā ācayagāmī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, ācayagāmī khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana1.11:219.6: domanassaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassa ca kiriyassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:219.7: Ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākassa ca kiriyassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:219.8: Ācayagāmī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:220.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:220.2: sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena apacayagāmicittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, apacayagāmī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:221.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:221.2: arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇena apacayagāmicittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, apacayagāmī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:222.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:222.2: arahā phalaṃ paccavekkhati, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati, nibbānaṃ phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:222.3: Arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, sotaṃ … pe …
patthana1.11:222.6: nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevācayagāmināpacayagāmicittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:222.13: nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:223.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:223.2: sekkhā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.11:223.3: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.11:223.4: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.11:223.10: nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.11:223.11: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā … pe …
patthana1.11:223.17: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena nevācayagāmināpacayagāmicittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:224.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:226.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.11:226.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ācayagāmī khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.11:226.5: taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.11:226.7: ācayagāmī adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.11:298.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate terasa.
patthana1.11:301.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:302.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:303.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.11:304.1: Ācayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.11:305.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:306.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:307.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.11:308.1: Apacayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.11:309.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.11:310.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.11:311.1: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo apacayagāmissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.11:312.1: Ācayagāmī ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ca dhammā ācayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.11:313.1: Ācayagāmī ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ca dhammā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.11:314.1: Apacayagāmī ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ca dhammā apacayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.11:315.1: Apacayagāmī ca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ca dhammā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.11:319.1: Nahetuyā pannarasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare pannarasa, nasahajāte ekādasa, naaññamaññe ekādasa, nanissaye ekādasa, naupanissaye cuddasa, napurejāte terasa, napacchājāte pannarasa, naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge pannarasa, nasampayutte ekādasa, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā pannarasa, novigate pannarasa, noavigate nava.
patthana1.11:323.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.11:327.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate terasa.
